version_description: Discover SEGA's stunning new game Sonic Forces: Speed Battle.
Discover SEGA's stunning new game Sonic Forces: Speed Battle.

Discover SEGA's stunning new game Sonic Forces: Speed Battle.
Now available worldwide with new characters added: Chaos, Classic Sonic, Zavok, Silver and Metal Sonic! Who’s your favorite?

Discover SEGA's stunning new game Sonic Forces: Speed Battle.

Discover SEGA's stunning new game Sonic Forces: Speed Battle.
This update is focused on bug fixes and optimizations. We've also changed the daily chest count limit so it resets everyday with the lucky character reset (8am UTC). We've also added Game Center achievements. Enjoy!

Discover SEGA's stunning new game Sonic Forces: Speed Battle.
This update is focused on bug fixes and optimizations. We've also changed the daily chest count limit so it resets everyday with the lucky character reset (8am UTC). We've also added Game Center achievements. Enjoy!

Discover SEGA's stunning new game Sonic Forces: Speed Battle.
Discover SEGA's stunning new game Sonic Forces: Speed Battle.

Sonic is back! Challenge millions of players around the world!
- Seasonal update! Tracks have received a makeover for the holiday season.
- Lightning has been adjusted and can now be dodged.
- The news feed has been updated and has moved to the home screen.
- Bug fixes and refinements

Sonic is back! Challenge millions of players around the world!

New runner - Cream has been added to the game!

New Track - Explore Viaduct Valley, now available at Tier 3! This special new track introduces triple dash pads. Hit three in a row for the ultimate boost!

Bug fixes and refinements

Sonic is back! Challenge millions of players around the world!

New runner - Cream has been added to the game!

New Track - Explore Viaduct Valley, now available at Tier 3! This special new track introduces triple dash pads. Hit three in a row for the ultimate boost!

Bug fixes and refinements

Thank you for making Sonic Forces: Speed Battle a success all around the world!

Update and start your battle NOW!

- Bug fixes and refinements

- Bug fixes and refinements

- Missions have been added, complete them for extra rewards!
- Two new tracks: Lambent Grove and Electric Arbor, found in Mystic Jungle Zone.
- New music for the Mystic Jungle Zone tracks.
- Significant performance improvements for low-end and mid-range devices.
- Various bug fixes and improvements.

Thank you for making Sonic Forces: Speed Battle a success all around the world! Update and start your battle NOW!
- A new track, Sandy Hills, has been added to Green Hill Zone
- Missions can now be swapped
- New sound effects added to the missions menu
- Updated icons for missions
- Bug fixes and refinements

New runner: Big the Cat has joined the team!
Three new items, Lilytrap, Chopper Chomp and Umbrella Boost.
New track, Tangled Tunnels, found at Tier 5!

New runner: Big the Cat has joined the team!
Three new items, Lilytrap, Chopper Chomp and Umbrella Boost.
New track, Tangled Tunnels, found at Tier 5!

- Seasons are here: climb the Tiers, earn rewards and become the Champion!
- Three Prestige Tiers added: Master, Elite and Champion.
- Layout adjustments to all tracks!
- The menus have a new look in celebration of version 2.0.0!

• Play as Jet the Hawk!
• New item: Bashosen.
• New track: Pinnacle Peaks, unlocks at Tier 6!

• Play as Jet the Hawk!
• New item: Bashosen.
• New track: Pinnacle Peaks, unlocks at Tier 6!

• Play as Zazz!
• New item: Star Trail.
• New track: Dash Vegas, unlocks at Tier 7!
• Game no longer freezes if a player took Wind damage after crossing the finish line

• Play as Zazz!
• New item: Star Trail.
• New track: Dash Vegas, unlocks at Tier 7!
• During battles Gold Rings are now lost on a percentage basis, to help prevent the lead runner escaping the pack as easily
• Game no longer freezes if a player took Wind damage after crossing the finish line

• Play as Zazz!
• New item: Star Trail.
• New track: Dash Vegas, unlocks at Tier 7!
• During battles Gold Rings are now lost on a percentage basis, to help prevent the lead runner escaping the pack as easily
• Game no longer freezes if a player took Wind damage after crossing the finish line

• New runner: Wave the Swallow!
• Two reverse tracks: Pyramid Valley R and Celestial Skyway R
• Korean language supported added
• Bug Fix: Race position no longer shows incorrectly as a player crosses the finish
line

- Events have been added! Take part to unlock and power up new Special characters
- Two mysterious new characters will be arriving for Halloween!
- Unlocked frame rate for high end Android devices
- Close buttons now have a larger touchable area to assist with their use on certain devices

- Balance change to Bashosen item - the trail no longer causes damage, but will instead slow opponents.
- Bug fixes and refinements.

- Balance change to Bashosen item - the trail no longer causes damage, but will instead slow opponents.
- Bug fixes and refinements.
Bug fixes and refinements
Bug fixes and refinements
Bug fixes and refinements

A new Super Rare character is getting ready to join the battle!

The holiday season is in full swing, look out for Special seasonal events coming soon

Additional privacy confirmation added following new store rules. All players will see the new privacy screen after updating the game

- New Special characters are on their way! Get ready for summer and keep an eye out for their events coming soon
- Various bug fixes and performance improvements

- Brawl Mode added. Attack your rivals to take the crown, whilst avoiding their own to keep it! Brawl Mode will only be active during certain events – keep your eyes open for the first appearance!
- New music is here! Enjoy the new sounds of the home screens, Sky Sanctuary and City zones.
- Lava Mine texture fixed

New Special characters are on their way! Keep an eye out for their events coming soon

A new type of event coming soon.

Bug fixes:
- Camera performance improved further and it should no longer drop under the track
- Improvement to performance across all devices
- Fixed projectile charge up and adjusted collision
- Fixed an issue where players could not claim their Season chest
- Various fixes to the tutorial battle for new players
- Metal Sonic's Steal item no longer targets Boost items
- Notifications fixed

• New Special holiday characters are on their way! Keep an eye out for their events coming soon
• Changes to track rotations for the new Seasons are on their way!
• New markers now make it clearer where nearby rivals are!
• Bug fixes and refinements

Balance Changes:
• Fire Boost deals less damage at all levels
• Invincibility does not last as long but goes faster
• Wrench Rush duration reduced

Coming soon:
- New festive character!
- New winter holiday event to unlock the new character!
- New mission type: Candy Cane

Balance updates:
- The Lava Bomb and Chaonado items no longer target rivals behind you. If you are in first position, the mine is simply dropped behind you.

Various bug fixes and improvements.
Bug fixes and refinements

Balance Changes:
For Season 11 we have introduced some major overhauls to the boost system:
• Duration and speed of all boosts significantly reduced
• Significantly increased the likelihood of picking up a boost when not in 1st
• Balance tweaks to various boosts within the new system

• New Special holiday characters are on their way! Keep an eye out for their events coming soon

A new Special character is here to carve their name onto the leaderboards! Look out for a whole month of treats this Halloween!

Tails' Vault has arrived! This new feature will create additional copies of certain character cards during specific events to help level up characters much faster! An in app purchase will be required to claim these additional cards.

Changes to the age verification process for improved account security. All players will see the age entry screen after updating the game.

- Two brand new Rare characters, Tangle and Whisper.
- With five unique and powerful abilities.
- Also, keep an eye out for an amazing Community Challenge later on in the Season.
- Improved jump physics.
- As well as, various bug fixes and performance improvements.

- Two brand new Rare characters, Tangle and Whisper.
- With five unique and powerful abilities.
- Also, keep an eye out for an amazing Community Challenge later on in the Season.
- Improved jump physics.

• New Special Character has been added! Keep an eye on the news for their event.
• Missions will now be shown on the matchmaking screen as well.
• Improved animations for Tangle’s and Whisper's attacks.
• Fixed an issue with the position of rivals not showing correctly.
• Fixed issues with Classic Sonic, Elf Classic Sonic, Chaos and Witch Rouge's collisions and collecting Items.
• A visual fix for shadows not appearing smoothly.
